detail_desc: Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sports trousers in fast-drying fabric made from recycled polyester with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs. Regular fit.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Trousers in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Leather sandals with pointed toes, heel caps, leather straps that tie around the ankle and a visible seam at the front. Leather insoles and soles. Covered heels 8.5 cm.
Joggers in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Leggings in washed stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Wide jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, concealed zip down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Two necklaces, one in metal with a coin-shaped pendant and one with semi-precious stones. Adjustable length 40.5-48 cm and 38-46 cm.

Cropped top in soft velvet made from recycled polyester with a V-shaped opening at the front and shoulders decorated with large, voluminous, sturdy flounces for a dramatic silhouette. Concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Sleeveless fitted top in a sturdy rib knit with a slight sheen. V-neck front and back.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft rib knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Large hair claw in metal and plastic. Length 9 cm.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a pompom on top and a ribbed turn-up at the hem with a fabric appliqué. Fleece lining.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Short, A-line dress in airy chiffon with heavy beaded embroidery. Stand-up collar, an opening at the back with covered buttons at the back of the neck and long sleeves. Jersey lining from the bust downwards.

Pyjamas with a long-sleeved shirt and bottoms in soft cotton flannel with decorative piping. Shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Short, wide sports top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric layered over a vest top with a racer back.
Cropped jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a raw-edge, frayed hem.
Short shorts in a glossy weave with wide elastication at the waist and an embroidered motif on one leg. Contrasting colour fabric stripes down the sides and short slits at the hems.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in soft satin with lace details. Top with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and short slits in the sides.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a frill-trimmed stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves with a frill at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable mesh with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Short jumper in a loose knit containing some wool with long, gently flared sleeves.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
V-neck blouse in gently draping silk with a small stand-up collar, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cap in soft, marled cotton jersey with a raised print on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
String briefs in cotton jersey with narrow elastication at the sides and a lined gusset.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that split into two at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation cork insoles and textured rubber soles.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pockets, pockets in the side seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Push-up bralette in lace with moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

T-shirt in hard-washed slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline and seam centre back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Wrapover top in jersey with a V-neck, seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and long, cuffed sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Striped top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.

Straight-cut, knee-length, double-breasted coat in soft, felted fabric with a brushed finish. Wide notch lapels, large, toning buttons, raglan sleeves and side pockets. Lining in quilted satin with a sheen.

Calf-length dress in spotted tulle with a gentle V-neck and gathered bodice with a draped effect. Adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps in satin, a concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist with concealed, adjustable elastication, and a flared skirt. Lined.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, a decorative back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with overlocked edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in thin, printed cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Cropped cardigan in a cable knit containing some wool with a deep V-neck and buttons down the front. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long, fully-fashioned sleeves and ribbed trims around the neckline, button band, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Thin metal chain necklace with a pendant in the shape of a crescent moon, and a trigger clasp. Adjustable length 48-57 cm.
Calf-length dress in sturdy ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Draped front, long sleeves, a concealed zip at the back and seam at the waist with an asymmetric skirt.
Shorts in an airy, textured weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and an open back pocket.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly and extended waistband with hook-and-eye fasteners. Diagonal side pockets, and jetted back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Fitted top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Blouse in airy chiffon with embroidery on the front, a small, frilled collar and V-neck with lacing. Long trumpet sleeves and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Gently flared, sleeveless jersey tunic.
Soft, patterned fleece top for a dog. Polo neck with a small opening at the top for a lead and openings underneath for the front legs.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Striped suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Wide waist belt with a round metal buckle. Width approx. 5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, print motif and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short lace dress with an opening and button at the back of the neck, wide raglan sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a fitted skirt. Lined.

Sleeveless, fitted sports top in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric. Zip at the top, wide elastication at the hem and a racer back. The top is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Twill trousers with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and detachable belt. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Short, crushed velvet skirt with an elasticated waist and seam with a bell-shaped lower section. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with lace at the hem and short slits in the sides.

Trousers in soft, gently draping silk satin with a sheen. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Jersey top with a print motif on the front in a narrrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps and a raw-edge neckline. Raw-edge, rounded hem.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a heart-shaped button at the top and long sleeves.
Short skirt in a sturdy weave with a high waist and double-breasted front. Unlined.
Tube scarf in a soft, textured knit.
Fully lined sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric. Narrow cut at the top and a racer back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and bow on the front, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless dress in printed viscose jersey with frill trims around the armholes and an elasticated seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Hoodie in a soft knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood. Kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine cotton knit with sequined embroidery and a round neck. Buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slippers in soft fabric with a decorative moccasin seam at the front. Faux fur linings and insoles and imitation suede soles with anti-slip protectors.
Patterned swimsuit with a frill around the neckline that continues over the shoulder straps, and a decorative bow at the back.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with a wide, elasticated waistband. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Velour bracelet with a snap-on strap and soft toy head with embroidered details and appliqués. Size 3.5x20 cm.
